text: What Are We Doing Here? () is a Canadian drama film, directed by Julie Hivon and released in 2014.Charles-Henri Ramond, "Qu’est-ce qu’on fait ici ? – Film de Julie Hivon". Films du Québec, September 5, 2014. The film centres on a group of friends in their 20s whose lives are shattered when one of them, Yan (Frédéric Millaire-Zouvi), dies in a car accident.Brendan Kelly, "Review: Qu’est-ce qu’on fait ici?". Montreal Gazette, September 25, 2014. The film stars Charles-Alexandre Dubé as Simon, Joëlle Paré Beaulieu as Roxanne, Maxime Dumontier as Max, Sophie Desmarais as Lily, Marie-Soleil Dion as Rosalie, and Guylaine Tremblay as Roxanne's mother Nicole. The film was shot in 2013, primarily in Saint-Amable and Granby, Quebec.Luc Boulanger, "Tournage de Qu'est-ce qu'on fait ici? : jeunesse d'aujourd'hui". La Presse, July 30, 2013. Paré-Beaulieu received a Jutra Award nomination for Best Actress at the 17th Jutra Awards."Dolan contre Dolan à la 17e Soirée des Jutra". Ici Radio-Canada, January 26, 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2014 films Category:2014 drama films Category:Canadian films Category:Canadian drama films Category:French-language films Category:Films set in Quebec Category:Films shot in Quebec
title: What Are We Doing Here? (film)
